gr.forth.ics.graph.algo
Class Trees.NodeLevelFinder

java.lang.Object
  gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.Trees.NodeLevelFinder
Enclosing class:
Trees
public static class Trees.NodeLevelFinder
extends Object

Represents the number of layers that exist underneath and above each node of a tree.

See Also:
Trees.findNodeLevels(InspectableGraph, Node, Direction)

Method Summary
 InspectableGraph getGraph()
          Returns the graph that contained the tree that was inspected.
 int getLayersAbove(Node node)
          Returns the number of layers above the given node (zero if the node is the root).
 int getLayersBelow(Node node)
          Returns the (maximum) number of layers below the given node (zero if the node is a leaf).

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
